## AbstractDevice.copyBuffer() method

Copies a buffer to another buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
copyBuffer(sourceBuffer: GPUDataBuffer, destBuffer: GPUDataBuffer, srcOffset: number, dstOffset: number, bytes: number): any;
```
